underlying_goal: User wanted to enhance a skill ('research-presentation') to proactively critique and improve presentations and plots for clarity.
friction_detail: Claude initially implemented an explicit 'Critique Mode' rather than the proactive, automatic critique the user wanted, requiring several rounds of clarification.
primary_success: Successfully updated the skill to include a proactive critique-and-improve paradigm, instructing the agent to automatically apply rubrics to presentations and plots.
brief_summary: User wanted to update a skill to automatically critique and improve presentations. Claude first implemented a manual mode, but after user clarification, it was updated to be a proactive instruction to critique slides and plots against defined rubrics. The changes were then committed and pushed.
